text: My darovali yemu Iskhaka (Isaaka) i Yakuba (Iakova). My poveli ikh oboikh pryamym putem. Yeshche ran'she My poveli pryamym putem Nukha (Noya), a iz yego potomstva - Davuda (Davida), Suleymana (Solomona), Ayyuba (Iova), Yusufa (Iosifa), Musu (Moiseya) i Kharuna (Aarona). Takim obrazom My vozdayem tvoryashchim dobro
